did.head: Descriptive Summary

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Box, John Glassell Ledger, M 16, Special Collections and Archives, James Branch Cabell Library, Virginia Commonwealth University

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The ledger was given to the Department by Mrs. Jane Bell Gladding in 1970.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: John Glassell was a merchant in Fredricksburg, Virginia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The ledger consists of approximately thirty pages detailing the accounts of John Glassell, a merchant in Fredericksburg (?). Most of the pages have been pasted over with nineteenth century clippings from newspapers.
